About Me

My Journey

As a Computer Science student with a Biology background, I bring a unique perspective to web development. My passion for technology led me to frontend development where I can combine creativity with technical skills.

I'm currently enhancing my skills in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and jQuery to build interactive and user-friendly websites. My goal is to become a professional frontend developer and contribute to meaningful projects.
